entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.7Â°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 1.7°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
